CustomField.formula: CASE(MONTH(TODAY()), 1, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.January_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.February_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.January_Meter_Read_Date__c), 2, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.February_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.March_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.February_Meter_Read_Date__c), 3, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.March_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.April_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.March_Meter_Read_Date__c), 4, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.April_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.May_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.April_Meter_Read_Date__c), 5, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.May_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.June_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.May_Meter_Read_Date__c), 6, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.June_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.July_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.June_Meter_Read_Date__c), 7, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.July_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.August_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.July_Meter_Read_Date__c), 8, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.August_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.September_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.August_Meter_Read_Date__c), 9, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.September_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.October_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.September_Meter_Read_Date__c), 10, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.October_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.November_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.October_Meter_Read_Date__c), 11, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.November_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.December_Meter_Read_Date__c,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.November_Meter_Read_Date__c), 12, IF( TODAY()> Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.December_Meter_Read_Date__c,null,Meter_Reading_Schedule__r.December_Meter_Read_Date__c), null)
CustomField.label: Upcoming Meter Read Date
